message: Git clone consistently fails for pilot-aspose-3d-foss-python github_ref despite valid SHA. Error: 'fatal: Remote branch 5c8d85a914989458e4170a8f603dba530e88e45a not found in upstream origin'. This SHA is confirmed valid via git ls-remote HEAD match, but git clone with --branch flag treats it as a branch name rather than a commit SHA.
suggested_fix: Investigation needed: git clone logic in TC-401 (W1 RepoScout) may be using --branch flag with commit SHAs instead of clone + checkout. Workaround: Use git clone <url> && git checkout <sha> instead of git clone --branch <sha> <url>. Evidence: Earlier successful runs (r_20260129T100847Z) suggest this is intermittent or environment-specific. Validate git clone implementation in execute_repo_scout.
